EmailTemplate.name: CR 10.8 Payment notification (waves with advance)
EmailTemplate.subject: Payment notification for {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c}.
Dear {!Job_placement__c.Contact_Name__c},
We hope that you had a great time on the programme! We have now processed payroll for your work{!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}.
Summary of your approved payroll for {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}
Your gross pay is {!Job_placement__c.Total_Amount_Paid__c}. This payment covers a total of {!Job_placement__c.days_worked__c} days.
This payment constitutes your work between the dates of {!Job_placement__c.Assignment_start_date__c} and {!Job_placement__c.Assignment_end_date__c}.
There are two payment dates for this wave. You will receive an advance payment ahead of the formal pay date, and then the remaining pay on {!Job_placement__c.Payroll_payment_date__c}.
Advance payment dates
All seasonal staff working on this wave will receive an advance payment of 70% of their gross pay.
Your advance payment is {!Job_placement__c.Payroll_advance_owed__c}. This amount will not be subject to tax and National Insurance (NI) contributions, and you will not receive a payslip for this payment.
You can see all of this summer's advance payment dates on this document: https://staffing.the-challenge.org/assets/2016payroll-WhenwillIbepaidformyrole.pdf
Your remaining salary
You will receive the remainder of your gross pay on {!Job_placement__c.Payroll_payment_date__c}. This amount will be subject to the tax and NI contributions from your total gross pay. Following these deductions, you may find on {!Job_placement__c.Payroll_payment_date__c} you receive far less than you’re expecting, in some cases this could be close to £0. On your payslip (sent via email on {!Job_placement__c.Payroll_payment_date__c}) you will see the total amount which you will receive with any tax and NI deductions listed, as well as the advance amount you received earlier .
What else?
Workplace pension auto-enrollment: Due to new auto-enrollment legislation, employees of The Challenge, including a small number of seasonal staff, will be enrolled into a workplace pension scheme. Auto-enrollment does not occur until October 2015 and staff will have the opportunity to opt-out at this point. To see if you qualify for auto-enrollment, please see our FAQs.
Additional payments:
You will receive a separate payment notification for each wave you work over the summer. If you feel that you are missing additional communications concerning your payment, please contact your local staffing team.
Any questions?
If you have any further questions about your payment, please contact your local staffing team quoting the email reference number in correspondence. Alternatively, information is available on our FAQs.
Best wishes, The Challenge Staffing Team
